title: Font identification - help needed
content:
Hi everyone,

I saw this font last week at the Dutch photography museum Foam.  
It has a beautiful uppercase M and the ligature fi is also really distinct.

Any suggestions? Or something that comes close?

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140713210731im_/http:/typophile.com/files/photo1_4394.JPG)
  

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140713210731im_/http:/typophile.com/files/photo2_5078.JPG)
author: mdemoiselle-m
